arts.ttl: Hull City boss Ruben Selles craving more joy after Plymouth Argyle success
arts.sum: City claimed a sixth win under Selles when they delivered a confident display to beat relegation rivals Plymouth Argyle 2-0 on Tuesday night, thanks to goals from Joe Gelhardt and Abu Kamara, to move them five points clear of the relegation zone with only 11 games left to play. “I don’t want to think about a second win in a row because every time we sit here talking about that – it’s happened five times, this is my sixth victory – we end up not getting it," he said.

arts.ttl: Ruben Selles delivers key verdict after Hull City's big Plymouth Argyle win
arts.sum: "We have crosses when we have four or five players in the box, situations like the first goal when we have players in the position because we create the stress on them that they need to defend, so I think the boys wanted to do it, and I think the finishing actions were part of it. Ruben Selles praised his Hull City side for a dominant 2-0 win over Plymouth Argyle at the MKM Stadium thanks to second half goals from Joe Gelhardt and Abu Kamara.

arts.ttl: Hull City player ratings vs Plymouth Argyle as Gustavo Puerta shows class in huge win
arts.sum: Hull City won for the first time in 2025 at the MKM Stadium by beating relegation rivals Plymouth Argyle 2-0, thanks to goals from Joe Gelhardt and Abu Kamara. City were the dominant force in a fairly quiet, goalless first period with Gustavo Puerta heading straight at goalkeeper Conor Hazard from Steven Alzate's clever ball to the back post, but they roared into the lead five minutes into the second period when Joe Gelhardt raced onto a deflected Sean McLoughlin shot to slam in the opener.

arts.ttl: Hull beat Plymouth in vital relegation clash
arts.sum: Joe Gelhardt and Abu Kamara scored second-half goals as Hull beat fellow Sky Bet Championship strugglers Plymouth 2-0 for their first home win of the year.

arts.ttl: Hull City secure huge home win to boost survival hopes against Plymouth Argyle
arts.sum: City dominated a goalless opening period and should have gone in front when Steven Alzate's clever ball to the back post found the onrushing Gustavo Puerta, but he could only head straight at goalkeeper Conor Hazard, summing up the Tigers' lack of confidence, and ruthlessness in front of goal. Regan Slater and Lincoln were both dropped to the bench with Steven Alzate, Gustavo Puerta, Abu Kamara and Joao Pedro all coming into the starting XI, while there was a welcome return to the matchday squad for fit-again Kasey Palmer.

arts.ttl: Hull see off relegation rivals Plymouth to boost Championship survival hopes
arts.sum: The hosts move five points clear of the drop zone.

arts.ttl: Predicted Hull City XI for Plymouth Argyle with Ruben Selles forced into midfield reshuffle
arts.sum: January signing Eliot Matazo cruelly became the third City player to be struck down by a season-ending ACL knee injury in last Tuesday night’s 1-0 defeat at relegation rivals Cardiff City. Elsewhere, it’s likely Joao Pedro will return to spearhead City ’s attack, with Selles desperate to bring goals to a side that haven’t seen a player in black and amber net since the draw with Norwich City when Matt Crooks powered in Lewie Coyle’s cross.

arts.ttl: ‘Lot of pace’ – Hull City verdict delivered by Plymouth Argyle boss Miron Muslic
arts.sum: Hull City have been described as a ‘balanced’ team in possession with a ‘lot of pace’ by Plymouth… The post ‘Lot of pace’ – Hull City verdict delivered by Plymouth Argyle boss Miron Muslic appeared first on The72 - Football League News.

arts.ttl: How Hull City's Yorkshire rivals have helped Plymouth Argyle prepare for crucial Championship game
arts.sum: Argyle have remained in the north of England since their 3-1 FA Cup defeat at Manchester City on Saturday night in a bid to help the players recover and prepare for what is arguably their biggest game of the season against the Tigers, rather than have to travel back to Devon and then come back again. Hull City's Yorkshire rivals, Huddersfield Town, have offered a helping hand to Plymouth Argyle in their preparations to take on the Tigers at the MKM Stadium tonight.

arts.sum: Hull City are back in action this evening with a home clash against Plymouth Argyle at the MKM… The post Puerta starts: Hull City team news and predicted XI to face Plymouth Argyle appeared first on The72 - Football League News.
